entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
